name: Godzilla Tries His Best
description:
Godzilla is sentenced to community service (Kaiju-nity Service) for breaking Tokyo a whole bunch.

He tries his best... though being 328ft monster has it's disadvantages. He is only equipped with human tools, tools of course not best designed for him. However, he won't stop, because he's legally obligated by way of court order.

Our submission for the Global Game Jam 2020, created at The Foundry@UWE.

Developed by:
Kit Bevan (ig: @_kbmedia_ )
Karsten Finlay
Matthew Harmon (twtr @MudTheSmol)
Cay Morris (twtr: @spam_can)
Victoria Serfontein
